Name: DJ Mole
About the game: DJ Mole DJ Mole is a cute little mole that loves music. He goes on a search for the best vinyl of the world to put on a big party for all his friends from the farm. A puzzle game with simple mechanics and instant and intuitive gameplay! Collect all the vinyl by moving the coloured blocks wisely. FEATURES : - Hours of gameplay to complete all levels! - Level-based scoring system based on moves optimization - Alternative ways to complete each level - More than 60 highly addictive levels spread between 3 different worlds - Collect bonuses - Open doors - Use teleporters - A nice and friendly mole!
